exchange.question: What happened here?
exchange.answer: A meteor hit the prison and the convicts have escaped!

exchange.question: Tell me more about the escaped prisoners.

character.statement: The rest is up to you. Good luck.
Thanks for your help! That Copy Cat was a real trickster.
Looks like Speeding Spike wasn't fast enough to outrun you!
Sir Rebral won't be playing any more of his mind games now!
Thanks to you, the Ratman is caged again
Excellent work! Now Crusher's back in his old stomping grounds.
Betty Jetty has finally been grounded, thanks to you!
The villains are all back behind bars, thanks to Ned Noodlehead...oh, and you.
I gave the Island Medallion to our hero, Ned Noodlehead!
Stand back! This thing isn't safe.
I think this meteor is a nice decoration for the prison.
There's been a prison break! We're all in danger!
It's a good thing those villains are back in prison!

exchange.question: What happened here?
exchange.answer: The impact from this meteor sent out a radioactive shockwave that mutated the prisoners.

exchange.question: So the prisoners have super powers?
exchange.answer: Yes! You'll need these anti-power handcuffs to capture them.

exchange.question: What happened here?
exchange.answer: The impact from this meteor sent out a radioactive shockwave that mutated the prisoners.

exchange.question: So the prisoners have super powers?
exchange.answer: Those handcuffs will remove any villain's super power.

character.statement: The meteor's radioactivity has worn off, so it's no longer a threat.
Civilians aren't allowed here. Please head back to the mainland.
You're clear to go.
Great work!
Be careful, there are escaped prisoners around!
Oh good, a new super hero! That last one is just sitting up on the Daily Paper Building!
Thanks, you're a real hero!
We can't let civilians past this point. There are super villains on the loose!
The prison warden and the scientist have some things for you over at the prison.
Be careful out there!
Looks like the island is safe again!
This isn't a safe place for civilians

exchange.question: Are you a real super hero?
exchange.answer: You better believe it, kid. I've defeated more villains than you can count.

exchange.question: What are you doing up here?
exchange.answer: I can't keep up with all these super villains anymore!

exchange.question: I want to be a super hero!
exchange.answer: There's more to it than having a suit and ID! Talk to me after you've defeated at least 5 villains.

character.statement: I'm impressed at what you've accomplished. I think you've got what it takes, kid.
There's just one more thing you need. You'll find it in the phone booth.
Remember, with great power comes great responsibility.
Well done, kid. Not bad at all.
